page.title: 11Penrikyber Colliery
page.content: The most important employer in Penrhiwceiber is the colliery.We were lucky enough to visit it.When we went we went into the offices and asked the pit manager some questions.We then went to the storeroom and were fitted with helmets.We saw the winding gear where they haul men,coal and supplies to and from the pit bottom.After that we went to the explosives house.The man there showed us different explosives and detonaters.At the head of the pit we had to go into an airlock,which was used for ventilation and we saw some miners finishing their shift.When the airlock door slammed it nearly shattered my ear drums.We had a very interesting day.
